name: Add Item
description: Add an item to the inventory
examples: Add 5 units of iPhone 15 to the inventory
Add 10 boxes of pens to the inventory

data_attributes.name: item name
data_attributes.description: The name of the item to be added

data_attributes.name: item quantity
data_attributes.description: The quantity of the item to be added

data_attributes.name: item quantity unit
data_attributes.description: Measurement unit of the item quantity

name: Remove Item
description: Remove an item from the inventory
examples: Remove 2 units of iPhone 15 from the inventory
Remove 5 boxes of pens from the inventory

data_attributes.name: item name
data_attributes.description: The name of the item to be removed

data_attributes.name: item quantity
data_attributes.description: The quantity of the item to be removed

data_attributes.name: item quantity unit
data_attributes.description: Measurement unit of the item quantity

name: Check Inventory
description: Check the inventory for a specific item
examples: How many pens are in the inventory?

data_attributes.name: item name
data_attributes.description: The name of the item to check in the inventory
